alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 7:16PM EDT until July 24 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Broome County in central New York... Central Tioga County in central New York... Southwestern Chenango County in central New York... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 716 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Candor to near Newark Valley, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Johnson City, Maine, Nanticoke, Port Dickinson, Newark Valley, Candor, Greater Binghamton Airport, Chenango Forks and Union Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
